short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: equITy for he and she and you and me

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a text-replace extension for internet browser google Chrome. It is a gender neutral pronoun extension that narrows down any sexual / gender pronoun into "it."
Does erasion of diversity necessarily bring equity?
